-%0Aclass Machine:%0A    def __init__(self, capacity:int = 0):%0A        self.slots = %5BSlot() for _ in range(capacity)%5D%0A        self.cash = 0.0%0A        self.capacity = capacity%0A%0A    def get_slots(self, index:int) -%3E list:%0A        if 0 %3C= index %3C self.capacity:%0A            return self.slots%5Bindex%5D%0A        print(%22fail:indice nao existe%22)%0A%0A        return None%0A    %0A    def set_slots(self, index:int, name:str, qtd:int, price:float):%0A        if not (0 %3C= index %3C self.capacity):%0A            print(%22fail:indice nao existe%22)%0A            return%0A        slot = self.slots%5Bindex%5D%0A        slot.set_name(name)%0A        slot.set_qtd(qtd)%0A        slot.set_price(price)%0A%0A    def clear(self, index:int):%0A        if not (0 %3C= index %3C self.capacity):%0A            print(%22fail:indice nao existe%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.slots%5Bindex%5D = Slot()%0A%0A    def insert_cash(self, amount:float):%0A        if amount %3C= 0:%0A            print(%22fail:valor invalido%22)%0A            return%0A        self.cash += amount%0A%0A    def buy(self, index:int):%0A        if not (0 %3C= index %3C self.capacity):%0A            print(%22fail:indice nao existe%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        slot = self.slots%5Bindex%5D%0A        if slot.get_name() == %22empty%22:%0A            print(%22fail:slot vazio%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        if slot.get_qtd() == 0:%0A            print(%22fail:espiral sem produtos%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        if self.cash %3C slot.get_price():%0A            print(%22fail:saldo insuficiente%22)%0A            return%0A        slot.set_qtd(slot.get_qtd() - 1)%0A        self.cash -= slot.get_price()%0A%0A        print(f%22voce comprou um %7Bslot.get_name()%7D%22)%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        lines = %5B%5D%0A        lines.append(f%22saldo: $%7Bself.cash:.2f%7D RS%22)%0A        for i, slot in enumerate(self.slots):%0A            lines.append(f%22%7Bi%7D: %7Bslot%7D%22)%0A        return %22%5Cn%22.join(lines)%0A    %0Adef main():%0A    machine: Machine = Machine()%0A    while True:%0A        line = input()%0A        args = line.split()%0A        print(f%22$%7Bline%7D%22)%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22init%22:%0A            machine = Machine(int(args%5B1%5D))%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(machine)%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22set%22:%0A            machine.set_slots(int(args%5B1%5D), args%5B2%5D, int(args%5B3%5D), float(args%5B4%5D))%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22clear%22:%0A            machine.clear(int(args%5B1%5D))%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22insert%22:%0A            machine.insert_cash(float(args%5B1%5D))%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22buy%22:%0A            machine.buy(int(args%5B1%5D))%0A        else:%0A            print(%22fail:comando invalido%22)%0A%0Amain()%0A
